example.eg: Bob was mocked for his mode of speech.
example.egtrans: 鲍勃因其讲话方式而受到嘲笑。

example.eg: The phone was switched to airplane mode.
The researcher calculated the mean and mode of the data.
example.egtrans: 研究人员计算了数据的均数和众数。

example.eg: The music student had to write a piece demonstrating the Dorian mode.
example.egtrans: 音乐系学生需要以多利亚调式写一首曲子。

example.eg: The piece transitions to minor mode in the third movement.
example.egtrans: 乐曲在第三章转变为降调调式。

example.eg: Rachel's wardrobe was always in mode.
example.egtrans: 瑞秋的衣着总是很时尚。

dsense.name: a la mode, à la mode

example.eg: Animal print is very a la mode right now.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 流行的, 按照流行款式的

dsense.name: a la mode, à la mode, alamode

example.eg: I ordered a piece of pie a la mode.
example.egtrans: 我点了一块儿上面浇着冰激凌的派。

example.eg: By analyzing the mode of operation, the police could tell that the same criminal was responsible for both crimes.

trans_examp.trans_cn: （犯罪分子的）一贯手法, 惯技
